FunctionalRequirements.Name: Voice-Activated Health Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to set and receive daily health reminders via simple voice commands, ensuring users understand the instructions without feeling overwhelmed.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Virtual Gathering Scheduling
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall enable users to schedule virtual gatherings with friends or family using voice commands, simplifying the process for users who may struggle with technology.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Cognitive Support Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide users with gentle reminders for engaging brain exercises and memory games tailored to their preferences, promoting cognitive activity.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Local Event Discovery
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to discover local events such as book clubs and exercise classes, encouraging social participation tailored for older adults.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Daily Activity Goal Setting
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to set personalized daily walking goals and provide motivational reminders tailored to their recovery needs.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: User-Friendly Interface
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide an intuitive and user-friendly interface that accommodates older adults with varying technical abilities, ensuring ease of navigation and interaction.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Data Privacy and Security
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall ensure that all user data is securely stored and processed in compliance with privacy regulations, providing users with control over their personal information.
